mapper.select: SELECT aa.customerId,aa.companyId,aa.apiTypeId,aa.stid,ifnull(aa.sumAmount,0) sumAmount,aa.countTotle,aa.countSuccess, bb.price,cc.name apiTypeName,dd.name subTypeName FROM ( SELECT a.customerId, a.apiTypeId, ifnull(a.stid, 0) stid, sum(b.amount) sumAmount, count(a.id) countTotle, count(b.id) countSuccess, c.companyId FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerRequestLog a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog b ON a.id = b.reqId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Customer c ON a.customerId = c.id WHERE a.createTime >= #{consuTime} AND a.customerId = #{customerId} GROUP BY a.apiTypeId,a.stid ) aa LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvw_api_CompanyApi bb ON aa.companyId=bb.companyId AND aa.apiTypeId=bb.apiTypeId AND aa.stid=bb.subTypeId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType cc ON aa.apiTypeId=cc.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator dd ON aa.stid=dd.id ORDER BY aa.countSuccess

SELECT a.apiTypeId,a.stid,a.apiId,a.resultCount,a.resultCostCount,CONCAT_WS('-',b.name,c.name) type_stid_name,e.name vendorName FROM ( SELECT a.apiTypeId,a.stid,a.apiId,count(a.id) resultCount,count(a.customerReqLogId) resultCostCount FROM ( SELECT a.id,a.apiTypeId,ifnull(a.stid,0) stid,ifnull(a.apiId,a.chosenApiId) apiId,c.customerReqLogId FROM qyfinance.fin_cust_req_resp a INNER JOIN qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog b ON a.id = b.reqId LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiRequestLog c ON a.id = c.customerReqLogId WHERE a.createTime >= #{consuTime} AND a.customerId = #{customerId} ) a WHERE a.apiTypeId = #{apiTypeId} AND a.stid = #{stid} GROUP BY a.apiTypeId,a.stid,a.apiId ) a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType b ON a.apiTypeId=b.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwMobileOperator c ON a.stid=c.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_Api d ON a.apiId = d.id LEFT JOIN qyfinance.finance_ApiVendor e ON d.vendorId = e.id

SELECT base.id customerId, aa.chargeWeekTotleAmount, bb.chargeMonthTotleAmount, cc.consumeWeekTotleAmount, dd.consumeMonthTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.bkvwCustomer base LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customerId,totleAmount chargeWeekTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_WeekMonthAmount WHERE weekMonthTypeId=1 AND tableId=1 AND years=#{years} AND weeks=#{weeks} ) aa ON base.id = aa.customerId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customerId,totleAmount chargeMonthTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_WeekMonthAmount WHERE weekMonthTypeId=2 AND tableId=1 AND years=#{years} AND months=#{months} ) bb ON base.id = bb.customerId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customerId,totleAmount consumeWeekTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_WeekMonthAmount WHERE weekMonthTypeId=1 AND tableId=2 AND years=#{years} AND weeks=#{weeks} ) cc ON base.id = cc.customerId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customerId,totleAmount consumeMonthTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_WeekMonthAmount WHERE weekMonthTypeId=2 AND tableId=2 AND years=#{years} AND months=#{months} ) dd ON base.id = dd.customerId WHERE base.typeId = 1
SELECT customerId id,sum(chargeAmount) chargeTotleAmount FROM qyfinance.CustomerChargeDayCount GROUP BY customerId
SELECT customerId id,sum(amount) currDayChargeAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog WHERE reasonId in(1,2,3) AND createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY customerId
SELECT customerId id,sum(sumAmount) currMonthAmount FROM qyfinance.bkvwCompanyApiTypeConsumeDayCount WHERE consuTime >= #{currMonthTime} GROUP BY customerId
SELECT customerId id,sum(amount) currDayAmount FROM qyfinance.finance_CustomerBalanceLog WHERE reasonId in (-1) AND createTime >= #{currDayTime} GROUP BY customerId

SELECT DISTINCT(aa.apiTypeId) id,bb.name FROM ( SELECT b.apiTypeId,b.apiId FROM qyfinance.bkvwCustomerBalanceLog a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwCustomerRequestLog b ON a.reqId=b.id WHERE a.reasonId IN(-1,-2,-3) AND b.hasCost=1 AND a.customerId=#{customerId} GROUP BY b.apiTypeId,b.apiId ) aa LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApiType bb ON aa.apiTypeId=bb.id WHERE aa.apiTypeId IS NOT NULL

SELECT aa.apiTypeId,aa.apiId,aa.totlePrice,bb.vendorName,bb.vendorId,bb.name apiName FROM ( SELECT b.apiTypeId,b.apiId,sum(a.amount) totlePrice FROM qyfinance.bkvwCustomerBalanceLog a LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwCustomerRequestLog b ON a.reqId=b.id WHERE a.customerId=#{customerId} AND b.hasCost=1 AND a.reasonId IN(-1,-2) GROUP BY b.apiTypeId,b.apiId ) aa LEFT JOIN qyfinance.bkvwApi bb ON aa.apiId = bb.id WHERE aa.apiTypeId=#{apiTypeId}
